name: Nightwave Suit (Operator)
description: A suit for all of you Dreamers out there.

languages.description: Ein Anzug für alle Träumer da draußen.
languages.name: Anzug: Nightwave (Operator)

languages.description: Une tenue pour vous tous, Rêveurs.
languages.name: Combinaison des Ondes Nocturnes (Opérateur)

languages.description: Una tuta per tutti i Sognatori là fuori.
languages.name: Tuta Nightwave (Operatore)

languages.description: Un traje para todos los Soñadores de allá afuera.
languages.name: Traje de Onda Nocturna (Operador)

languages.description: 适合你们所有梦回者的套服。
languages.name: 午夜电波套服（指挥官）

languages.description: 夢見るもの達へのスーツ。
languages.name: Nightwave スーツ（オペレーター）

languages.description: Um traje para todos os Sonhadores que andam por aí.
languages.name: Traje da Nightwave (Operador)

languages.description: ชุดสำหรับคนช่างฝันทุกคน
languages.name: ชุด Nightwave (โอเปอเรเตอร์)

languages.description: Dışarıdaki tüm Rüyacılar için bir kostüm.
languages.name: Nightwave Kostümü (Operatör)
